title: Nakitai Watashi wa Neko wo Kaburu (A Whisker Away)
synopsis: Miyo Sasaki is an energetic high school girl who comes from a broken family consisting of her unconfident father and an overly invested stepmother, whose attempts at connecting with Miyo come across as bothersome. Seeing Kento Hinode as a refuge from all her personal issues, she can't help herself from forcing her unorthodox demonstrations of love onto her crush.
characters: ['Sasaki, Miyo', 'Hinode, Kento', 'Cat Store Owner', 'Kinako', 'Fukase, Yoriko', 'Kakinuma', 'Sasaki, Youji', 'Isami, Masamichi', 'Sugita', 'Sakaguchi, Tomoya']
voices: ['Shida, Mirai', 'Hanae, Natsuki', 'Yamadera, Kouichi', 'Kitamura, Eri', 'Kotobuki, Minako', 'Miki, Shinichiro', 'Chiba, Susumu', 'Ono, Kensho', 'Yoshida, Oolongta', 'Namikawa, Daisuke']
